citations.narrative:
The enclosure housing two bobcats has two-night houses with deteriorating and damaged wood sections. There are also
several exposed rusty nails protruding inward towards the animals. The cougar enclosure contains deteriorated wooden
night houses and platforms. There are also several areas along the bottom of the chain-linked fence that are rusted and
deteriorated. The deteriorated night houses and rust pose a potential hazard to the animal's safety and well-being.
Facilities shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury. The
licensee must ensure structural elements shall be sound and in good repair, free from hazardous conditions such as
sharp edges, nails, splinters, or loose, rusty, or deteriorated materials. Correct by July 3, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the curator.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The enclosure housing two bobcats has two-night houses with deteriorating and damaged wood sections. There are also 
several exposed rusty nails protruding inward towards the animals. The cougar enclosure contains deteriorated wooden 
night houses and platforms. There are also several areas along the bottom of the chain-linked fence that are rusted and 
deteriorated. The deteriorated night houses and rust pose a potential hazard to the animal's safety and well-being. 
Facilities shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury. The 
licensee must ensure structural elements shall be sound and in good repair, free from hazardous conditions such as 
sharp edges, nails, splinters, or loose, rusty, or deteriorated materials. Correct by July 3, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the curator. 
 
 n
